title: Psionics
text:
Psionic characters have the following unique characteristics:

- y Their attack dice pool is calculated against the target's Soul Harvest attribute instead of their AGI.

- y Their attack dice pool starts at 3 attack dice when attacking any model without a Soul Harvest attribute (e.g. Monsters and Summoned).

- y They are unable to target the Effigy with their basic attacks.

- y Gains +1 RES vs MAG attacks.
